name: Calendly
description: Integrate with Calendly to list, get, list and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: List Events
tools.description: List scheduled Calendly events. Filter by status and date range. Requires the user URI.

tools.name: Get Event
tools.description: Get detailed information about a specific Calendly event by its UUID.

tools.name: List Event Types
tools.description: List available Calendly event types (booking pages) for a user. Returns names, durations, and scheduling URLs.

tools.name: Cancel Event
tools.description: Cancel a scheduled Calendly event. Provide the event UUID and an optional cancellation reason.
